鷃字的基本解释

鷃
yàn
古同“鴳”：“夫藩篱之鷃，岂能与之料天地之高哉！”

鷃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》烏澗切，去諫，影。］
亦作“鷃1”。
鴳雀。鹑的一种。
[②]［è］
幽鴳。古代传说中的怪兽名。

鷃字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷃； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1497第09
【廣韻】烏㵎切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】於諫切，?音晏。同鴳鴽也。一名鵪，又名鸋。小雀也。【禽經】雉上有丈，鷃上有赤。雉上飛能丈，故計丈。鷃上飛能尺。赤與尺通。亦作斥，莊子所云斥鷃是也。李時珍曰：鷃不木處，可謂安寧自如矣。莊子所謂騰躍不過數仞，下翔蓬蒿之閒者也。又曰鷃，?鳥也。常晨鳴如雞，趨民收麥，行者以爲?。【禮·內則】雉兔鶉鷃。又【集韻】伊甸切，音宴。鶉屬。

鷃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷃字的起名意思

古同“鴳”。

[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" Wujian cut, go to admonish, shadow. ]
Also known as "鷃1".
Buffalo. A kind of quail.
[②] [è]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷃; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1497 Page 09
[Guang Yun] Wu 㵎 cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yu Jianqie,? Yin Yan. The same as 鴳鴽 also. A quay, also known as a quail. Little tits too. [Qin Jing] There are feet on the pheasant, and red on the pheasant. The pheasant can fly on the ground, so it's a trick. Go on the flying energy ruler. Chi and Chi are connected. It is also a rebuke, as Zhuangzi said. Li Shizhen said: If there is no wood, it can be said to be peaceful and comfortable. Zhuangzi's so-called prancing is no more than a few cents, and it is also the idler of Xiaxiang Penghao. He said, "Birds too." Chang Chenming is like a chicken, seeking the people to harvest wheat, the traveler thinks? 【Li · Nei Ze】The pheasant and rabbit quail. Also 【Jiyun】Eden cut, sound feast. Quail.
